settings.title: Product Qualites
settings.content:
Flexibility in Focus: We guarantee a comfortable fit with a sense of luxury, without compromising on durability. Our clothes adapt to your movements and keep their shape.

Wrinkle-free Convenience: Forget the iron. Our garments are designed to be wrinkle-free. Wash, hang up, and they're ready to wear again.

Breathability and Quick Drying: Stay cool and fresh all day long. Our fabrics are selected for their breathability and quick-drying properties.

Odour control: Our fabrics are treated to neutralize bacteria that cause body odour. With Duclaire you can feel fresh, even after a long day.

settings.title: Shipping information
settings.content:
Sweden: 2 - 5 working days (Free shipping over 1500 SEK)

Rest of the world: 4-7 working days (Free over 150-200€ depending on region)

We offer a 30-day right of return or exchange if for any reason you are not satisfied with your order. For more information see our return policy here.

NOTE:

For items purchased during our sale, DUCLAIRE does not offer refunds. These items can only be exchanged for another item from our collection or can be redeemed for store credit as a type of gift card.

settings.subtitle: Fits any occasion
settings.title: THE PERFECT FIT
settings.text: Tailor-made to fit perfectly every time. Countless samples have been remeasured and reconfigured until we finally achieved the ultimate blend of materials for a premium feel and quality. With Duclaire, you can count on an unparalleled fit and comfort, whatever the occasion.

settings.title: THE PERFECT FIT
settings.text: Tailor-made to fit perfectly every time. Countless samples have been remeasured and reconfigured until we finally achieved the ultimate blend of materials for a premium feel and quality. With Duclaire, you can count on an unparalleled fit and comfort, whatever the occasion.

settings.title: FOR ALL OCCASIONS
settings.text: Duclaire products are the ultimate pants for all occasions. You can wear them at home, at work or at the gym. Wherever you are, our garments give you both comfort and style.

settings.title: EXPRESS DELIVERY
settings.text: We ship globally with DHL Express, FedEX and Postnord, for the fastest and most reliable service. Free shipping for orders over 150€ in Europe | 200€ for the rest of the world.

settings.title: BUY NOW, PAY LATER
settings.text: Klarna payments give you extra flexibility when paying for your order as you can pay within 30 days. Try on your pants first and then decide if you want to keep them.

settings.title: 30 DAYS RETURN
settings.text: Didn't fit - no problem! You can always return or exchange. We offer a 30-day return or exchange policy if for any reason you are not satisfied with your order.
